summary.span: 抽象類別，實作時會以動畫方式顯示 值。

span.span: Abstract class that, when implemented, animates a value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用衍生類別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following code example demonstrates how to use the derived class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[keyframes_ovw_snippet#PointAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_ovw_snippet/CS/PointAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.xaml#pointanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)]

See the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md) for information about extending animation classes.

summary.span: 建立這個 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

span.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed object GetCurrentValue (object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetCurrentValue(object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
public: override System::Object ^ GetCurrentValue(System::Object ^ defaultOriginValue, System::Object ^ defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);
override this.GetCurrentValue : obj * obj * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> obj

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的初始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的目的值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: ，可產生 或 值，供動畫使用以產生其輸出值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.

returns.span: 這個動畫認為應該是該屬性目前值的值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`參數取決於撰寫鏈結中的動畫的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果動畫是在撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置，而且它會取代另一個動畫，`defaultOriginValue`是它已取代次動畫的輸出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果動畫是撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置中，而且沒有動畫來取代，`defaultOriginValue`是動畫屬性的基底值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果這個動畫不在第一個位置組合的鏈結，然後`defaultOriginValue`是前一個動畫中有撰寫鏈結所傳回的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`參數取決於是否已存在的先前屬性組合圖層。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果前一個屬性組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是來自該圖層的輸出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果沒有任何先前的組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是會顯示動畫之屬性的基底值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 如需動畫組合的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 如需有關如何建立自訂動畫類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的初始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.span: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的目的值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: ，可產生 或 值，供動畫使用以產生其輸出值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.

returns.span: 這個動畫認為應該是該屬性目前值的值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`參數取決於撰寫鏈結中的動畫的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果動畫是在撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置，而且它會取代另一個動畫，`defaultOriginValue`是它已取代次動畫的輸出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果動畫是撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置中，而且沒有動畫來取代，`defaultOriginValue`是動畫屬性的基底值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果這個動畫不在第一個位置組合的鏈結，然後`defaultOriginValue`是前一個動畫中有撰寫鏈結所傳回的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`參數取決於是否已存在的先前屬性組合圖層。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果前一個屬性組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是來自該圖層的輸出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果沒有任何先前的組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是會顯示動畫之屬性的基底值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 如需動畫組合的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 如需有關如何建立自訂動畫類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

abstract member GetCurrentValueCore : System.Windows.Point * System.Windows.Point * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> System.Windows.Point

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建議的原始值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的起始值，便會使用這個值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: ，產生主機動畫所用的 或 。

span.span: An that generates the or used by the host animation.

summary.span: 計算值，代表正在顯示動畫之屬性的目前值，由主機動畫所決定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the host animation.
The current value of this animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`參數取決於撰寫鏈結中的動畫的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果動畫是在撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置，而且它會取代另一個動畫，`defaultOriginValue`是它已取代次動畫的輸出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果動畫是撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置中，而且沒有動畫來取代，`defaultOriginValue`是動畫屬性的基底值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果這個動畫不在第一個位置組合的鏈結，然後`defaultOriginValue`是前一個動畫中有撰寫鏈結所傳回的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`參數取決於是否已存在的先前屬性組合圖層。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果前一個屬性組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是來自該圖層的輸出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果沒有任何先前的組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是會顯示動畫之屬性的基底值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 如需動畫組合的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 如需有關如何建立自訂動畫類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
